Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler

  • Packages that use IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation
    Contains all classes to activate the AnnotationPlugin#ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-annotation.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

      Subinterfaces of IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      (package private) interface  HasBackgroundColor
      Interface to map the background color options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsBoxAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsEllipseAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsLineLabel
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) interface  IsDefaultsPointAnnotation
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options interface.
      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation that implement IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoxAnnotation
      Implements a BOX annotation which draws a box in the a chart.
      If one of the axes is not specified, the box will take the entire chart dimension.
      The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
      (package private) class  DefaultBox
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin BOX annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultEllipse
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin ELLIPSE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultLineLabel
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin LABEL of LINE annotation DEFAULTS options.
      (package private) class  DefaultPoint
      This is the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin POINT annotation DEFAULTS options.
      class  EllipseAnnotation
      Implements a ELLIPSE annotation which draws a ellipse in the a chart.
      If one of the axes is not specified, the ellipse will take the entire chart dimension.
      The 4 coordinates, xMin, xMax, yMin, yMax are optional.
      class  LineLabel
      Implements a LABEL to apply on a LINE annotation.
      class  PointAnnotation
      Implements a POINT annotation which draws a point in the a chart.
      Constructors in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation with parameters of type IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      BackgroundColorHandler(AbstractAnnotation parent, IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler defaultValues, NativeObject nativeObject)
      Creates a background color handler with the native object where background color properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.
      BackgroundColorHandler(AbstractAnnotation parent, IsDefaultsBackgroundColorHandler defaultValues, NativeObject nativeObject, String defaultBackgroundColor)
      Creates a background color handler with the native object where background color properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.
